hero.description: Custom software development for SMBs and startups: from ERP integration, to order automation, to IoT monitoring of your facilities. Without the cost of an internal IT department.

about.title: > luigi@sendline:~$ whoami
about.paragraph1: My name is Luigi. I wrote my first lines of code at technical school and never stopped. I worked as a Backend Developer at Deltatre, building platforms that served millions of users. Then as IT Manager at Rogelfrut, where I experienced firsthand what it means to make technology work in a real company — with limited budgets, daily emergencies, and software that won't talk to each other.
about.paragraph2: The truth is that SMBs have serious technology problems but rarely find someone who solves them without overcomplicating everything. Big vendors are too expensive and too slow. Generic freelancers lack the big picture. What was needed was a middle ground: someone with real business experience, who develops concrete solutions and works side by side with you.
about.paragraph3: That's why I founded SendLine. Automations, ERP integrations, IoT monitoring, AI chatbots — all custom-built, with a single point of contact and no middlemen. If you have a process that's slowing you down, I can probably automate it. If you have two systems that don't communicate, I'll make them talk.

cost.question: How much does a project cost?
cost.answer: It depends on the complexity. After a free initial call, I provide a detailed quote with clear timelines and costs. No commitment.

timeline.question: How long does it take?
timeline.answer: Simpler projects (automations, integrations) take 2-4 weeks. More complex solutions 1-3 months. I always give you a clear timeline before starting.

remote.question: Do you only work with local companies?
remote.answer: No, I work remotely with clients across Italy. A video call is all we need to get started.

changes.question: What if I need changes after release?
changes.answer: I offer ongoing support. Small changes are included, for larger improvements we agree on timelines and costs before proceeding.

examples.question: Can I see examples of previous work?
examples.answer: Yes, you can find some real cases in the projects section. For more specific details, we can discuss on a call.

satisfaction.question: What if I'm not satisfied with the project?
satisfaction.answer: I work with incremental releases to avoid surprises. You see and approve each phase before moving forward.

dataCollected.title: 2. Personal Data Collected
dataCollected.content: Through the contact forms on this website, we collect: name, email address, and the content of your message. Optionally: project type and estimated budget. We also collect technical data such as IP address, browser type, operating system and pages visited, through server logs and Vercel Analytics (a statistical analysis service that does not use cookies and processes data in anonymous and aggregated form). For anti-spam protection of contact forms, we use Cloudflare Turnstile, a privacy-friendly service that does not use profiling cookies.

purposes.title: 3. Purpose of Data Processing
purposes.content:
Personal data is processed for the following purposes:
• Responding to contact requests and providing information about our services
• Managing pre-contractual relationships
• Anonymous statistical analysis of website traffic (Vercel Analytics)
• Anti-spam protection for contact forms (Cloudflare Turnstile)

legalBasis.title: 4. Legal Basis for Processing
legalBasis.content:
Data processing is based on the following legal grounds:
• Consent of the data subject (Art. 6(1)(a) GDPR), expressed by selecting the appropriate checkbox and submitting the contact form
• Performance of pre-contractual measures (Art. 6(1)(b) GDPR), for managing information and quote requests
• Legitimate interest of the Controller (Art. 6(1)(f) GDPR), for anonymous statistical analysis of website traffic and anti-spam protection of contact forms.

retention.title: 5. Data Retention Period
retention.content: Personal data collected through contact forms is retained for the time necessary to manage the request and for a maximum of 24 months from collection, unless legal obligations require longer retention.

sharing.title: 6. Data Sharing
sharing.content:
Personal data is not sold to third parties. It may be shared with the following service providers, necessary for the operation of the website:
• Vercel Inc. (USA) - website hosting and anonymous analytics. Data may be transferred to the USA based on the EU-US Data Privacy Framework and Standard Contractual Clauses (SCC). Privacy policy: https://vercel.com/legal/privacy-policy
• Cloudflare Inc. (USA) - Turnstile anti-spam protection service. Data may be transferred to the USA based on the EU-US Data Privacy Framework and Standard Contractual Clauses (SCC). Privacy policy: https://www.cloudflare.com/privacypolicy/
• Aruba S.p.a. - for receiving and managing contact emails. Privacy policy: https://www.aruba.it/documents/tc-files/it/11_it_privacy_policy_aruba_spa.aspx

rights.title: 7. Your Rights
rights.content:
Under Articles 15-22 of the GDPR, you have the right to:
• Access your personal data
• Request rectification or deletion of your data
• Restrict or object to processing
• Request data portability
• Withdraw consent at any time
• Lodge a complaint with the Italian Data Protection Authority (Garante per la Protezione dei Dati Personali – www.garanteprivacy.it)

To exercise your rights, contact: luigi@sendline.it

cookies.title: 8. Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.content:
This website uses the following technologies:
Technical cookies — necessary for the proper functioning of the website. They do not require user consent and cannot be disabled. They include session cookies and browsing preferences (e.g. selected language).
Vercel Analytics — a statistical traffic analysis service that does not use cookies, does not collect personally identifiable data, and processes information in anonymous and aggregated form. It does not require user consent.
You can manage cookie preferences through your browser settings. Disabling technical cookies may affect website functionality.
Cloudflare Turnstile — an anti-spam protection service provided by Cloudflare Inc., which does not use profiling cookies and operates in compliance with the GDPR. Privacy policy: https://www.cloudflare.com/privacypolicy/
